summary: Provides a comprehensive mock implementation of the Amazon Elastic Container Service (ECS) backend, defining data models for clusters, services, tasks, task definitions, capacity providers, container instances, and associated error representations, along with utilities for ARN handling, CloudFormation translation, and standardized response generation.
business_intent: Enable developers to test and develop applications that interact with ECS by simulating the full range of ECS operations and resources locally, without requiring access to real AWS infrastructure.
